doc:
Simon Scott (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simon_Scott_(actor) 0 Simon Scott (September 21, 1920 – December 11, 1991) was an American character actor from Monterey Park, California. He was best known for his role as Arnold Slocum on Trapper John M.D. and as General Bronson on McHale's Navy. Simon_Scott ( September_21_,_1920 – December_11_,_1991 ) was an_American_character_actor from Monterey_Park , California . He was_best_known for his_role as Arnold_Slocum on Trapper_John_M.D. and as General_Bronson on McHale 's_Navy .
